name: Python Streamlit DevContainer
updateContentCommand:
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade -y && \
  if [ -f packages.txt ]; then sudo xargs apt-get install -y < packages.txt; fi && \
  if [ -f requirements.txt ]; then pip install -r requirements.txt; fi && \
  pip install streamlit openpyxl pandas gspread oauth2client && \
  echo '✅ Packages installed and Requirements met'

postAttachCommand.message: ⚡ Bienvenido al contenedor. Ejecuta 'streamlit run tienda.py' manualmente para ver errores en la terminal.
